DataElement.preferredName: Person Substance Abuse Past Month Frequency
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Questions asking the respondent how many day in the past 30 days s/he used an illicit substance. [Manually curated]

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Substance Abuse Past Month Frequency
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Questions asking the respondent how many day in the past 30 days s/he used an illicit substance. [Manually curated]

Property.preferredName: Substance of Abuse Past Month Frequency
Property.preferredDefinition: Any substance, including any illegal, prescription, over-the-counter agent or any other compound, used for the purpose other than indicated or used in quantities other than directed. Substances from various drug classes can be abused, such as opioids, amphetamines, analgesics, benzodiazepines, barbiturates, hallucinogens, steroids, tobacco products and alcoholic substances. A substance of abuse may act on the central nervous system (CNS) or can have an effect in other parts of the body and can lead to physical and/or physiological dependence.:Past; before the present time.:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:The number of occurrences of something within a given time period. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: Any substance, including any illegal, prescription, over-the-counter agent or any other compound, used for the purpose other than indicated or used in quantities other than directed. Substances from various drug classes can be abused, such as opioids, amphetamines, analgesics, benzodiazepines, barbiturates, hallucinogens, steroids, tobacco products and alcoholic substances. A substance of abuse may act on the central nervous system (CNS) or can have an effect in other parts of the body and can lead to physical and/or physiological dependence.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.
